chunk:
Formula 10.0.6 So Totally Clea Micellaer Cleansing Water (2019 formulation)

Brand: Formula 10.0.6

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: WATER, POLYSORBATE 20, ISOPENTYLDIOL, PEG-7 GLYCERYL COCOATE, LACTIC ACID, FOENICULUM VULGARE (FENNEL) SEED EXTRACT, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) FLOWER EXTRACT, HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WATCH HAZEL) LEAF EXTRACT, CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) FRUIT EXTRACT, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT, ECHINACEA PURPUREA EXTRACT,

(LAVENDER) FLOWER EXTRACT, HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WATCH HAZEL) LEAF EXTRACT, CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) FRUIT EXTRACT, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT, ECHINACEA PURPUREA EXTRACT, LAMINARIA DIGITATA EXTRACT, HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE, DISODIUM EDTA, GLYCERIN, PHENOXYETHANOL, SODIUM HYDROXIDE.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
